column4: What command can I use to see if a binary is compatible with the currently running kernel? e.g. I want an affirmative result for checking a 32-bit bin on a 64-bit system, but a negative result for checking a 64 on a 32. If this is a common *nix command and will also check e.g. if I'm trying a Mac binary on Ubuntu, then that would be ideal.
best is to try to run it!
But I don't want to run it if it will run.
